Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Since our march must be firm and vigorous, I have ordered the Justice of the Peace of this parish to remove all the ponchos that had been made in the district and place them in the deposit that I will create under the direction of Captain Francisco Xavier, Commander of the northern site; and also to send them to citizen Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro, for him to forward to Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency. Barracks in Mostardas, July 9, 1836. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Colonel Bento Gonçalves da Silva, Superior Commander of the National Guard of this Province. Domingos José de Almeida, Colonel Chief of Legion.

Copy. Document written entirely on the reverse of document CV-200.
